story_teamgalactic_01_14000/2401_1201_02:
This is the world your boss Cyrus is really trying
to achieve.
story_teamgalactic_01_14000/2401_1201_04:
If you have any feelings—the human spirit that
Cyrus is talking about—within you...
story_teamgalactic_01_14000/2401_1201_05:
then I think it might be worth reconsidering a few
things. Even if it’s just a little bit.
story_teamgalactic_01_14000/2401_1201_06: That’s all I had to say. I’ll be on my way now.
story_teamgalactic_01_14000/2401_1201_07:
We followed Master Cyrus because we were
drawn to his vision of that wonderful new galaxy
he spoke of...
story_teamgalactic_01_14000/2401_1201_08:
Does this mean we were kept in the dark about
his true ideals?
story_teamgalactic_01_14000/2401_1201_09:
This loyalty we feel for him...
Is that something he finds worthless, too?
